name: Dreamcastnoid (SEGA Dreamcast)
description:
My little homebrew for the DCJAM 2016 programmed in BennuGD.

Fight against P$2 with your balls (only a few if is possible).

Press directional buttons or L,R to move and A to add a new ball.

Maybe you could find some cheats and secrets...

Enjoy!!

-Ryo Suzuki 2016 (www.segasaturno.com)

Dreamcast™ is a registered trademark of SEGA Corporation.

This Dreamcast software is homebrew and is not officialy licensed, designed, manufactured, distributed or endorsed by SEGA Corporation.

Just for fun!
